mapper.select: SELECT longitude , latitude , voyage_risk_map_id , longitude_length , latitude_length , wind_speed , wind_direction , wave_height , wave_direction , relative_humidity , total_column_water_vapor , skin_temperature , voyage_risk_level , tidal_current_speed , tidal_current_direction , typhoon_longitude , typhoon_latitude , typhoon_grade FROM voyage_risk_map_last
